sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, Checkbox, Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/styles"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { bookShow, viewSeats } from '../redux/showActions'; const label = { inputProps: { 'aria-label': 'Checkbox demo' } } const useStyles = makeStyles({ root: { margin: 'auto', padding: 15, marginBottom: 20, } }) const SeatDisplay = ({data}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const classes = useStyles() const userId = useSelector( state => state.userTokener._userId ) const seat = useSelector( state => state.seat.seats ) const [seats, setSeats] = useState([]) const selectSeats = (event) => { if (!seats.includes(event.target.value)) setSeats(prev => [...prev, event.target.value]) else { let filteredSeats = seats.filter(seat => seat !== event.target.value) setSeats(filteredSeats) } } if(seat) console.log("seats : ",seat) const bookHandler = () => { dispatch(bookShow({ movieId : data.selectedMovieId, showDate : data.selectedDate, userId, seats })) } return (<> {seats && {seats.toString()}}
{/* */} ) } export default SeatDisplay
